p: Median recorded BCS was 6, with 30 dogs (81%) having a BCS of between 5 and 7. Median preoperative OFS was 4 (range 0‐13), median OFS change per day hospitalised was 0.7 (range 0.0‐2.0) and median final OFS was 11 (range 0‐14). No significant association was found between BCS and any of the recorded outcome measures in this study population.
